description:
The fearsome warrior Fujiwara Touta Hidesato fears nothing; a village doctor changes his way, and Please! Cling! Please! Hold!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Straw Bale Touta / The Fox Gives Birth / Cling and Hold
Tawara no Touta / Kitsune no Osan / Tottsuku Hittsuku
たわらの藤太 / 狐のお産 / 取っつく引っつく
